name: Dating and Boxing
description:
Welcome to Dating & Boxing, where you try to go deeper and deeper into a relationship... by engaging in boxing matches against your date! Oh, and there is also the standard visual novel stuff.

The game is divided between dating segments and boxing segments.

The boxing segments require some explanation:

  • W / Up arrow: Throw a high punch
  • S / Down arrow: Throw a low punch
  • A & D / Left & Right arrow: Dodge
  • Hit your opponent on the vulnerable parts of their body.
  • Dodge your opponent's attacks or intercept them with a punch of your own.

Finally, be careful with your words. Picking the wrong dialogue options will only get you deeper and deeper into trouble...

This game was made for Ludum Dare 48.
The theme was: Deeper and deeper.
